description: Try our easy to follow Pasta With Bean & Broccolini Pesto recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Pesto pasta,Pescatarian,Low saturated fat,Seafood free,Low salt,Tree nut free,Low sugar,Sesame free,Broccolini,Halal,Quick & easy dinner,High protein,High fibre,Soy free,Vegetarian,Vegan,Low fat,Peanut free
name: Pasta With Bean & Broccolini Pesto Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Cook 500g spaghetti following packet instructions or until al dente, adding 1/2 cup shelled frozen broad beans and 1 bunch broccolini, chopped, during the final minute of cooking. Drain and stir through 1 cup Bean & broccolini pesto (see recipe). Garnish with mint leaves and serve.
